SEARCH
Package com.glowmart.shop_management.service.implementation

Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.glowmart.shop_management.service.implementation.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
@Service public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
Implementation of ProductService that provides business logic for managing Product entities.

This service handles product creation, updating, deletion, and retrieval. It validates input data, enforces ownership rules, manages product images, and throws custom exceptions such as NotValidException, DuplicateException, NotFoundException, and AccessDeniedException.

  • Method Details

    • createProduct

      public ProductDto createProduct(String categoryName, boolean active, String productJson, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IOException
      Creates a new product under the specified category.

      Validates product details, generates a product image file, associates the product with the authenticated user, and calculates discount amounts before saving.

      Specified by:
      createProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the name of the category to assign the product to
      active - flag indicating whether the product is active
      productJson - JSON string containing product details
      file - the product image file
      Returns:
      the created ProductDto
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while processing the image file
      IllegalArgumentException - if price or discount values are invalid
      DuplicateException - if a product with the same name already exists

    • updateProductById

      public ProductDto updateProductById(String id, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String productJson, String categoryName, boolean active) throws IOException
      Updates an existing product by its ID.

      Ensures that only the product owner can update the product, validates new product details, updates product image and category, and recalculates discount amounts.

      Specified by:
      updateProductById in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to update
      file - the new product image file
      productJson - JSON string containing updated product details
      categoryName - the new category name
      active - flag indicating whether the product is active
      Returns:
      the updated ProductDto
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while processing the image file
      NotValidException - if the product ID or name is invalid
      NotFoundException - if no product exists with the given ID
      DuplicateException - if the new product name already exists
      AccessDeniedException - if the authenticated user is not the product owner

    • getProductByName

      public ProductDto getProductByName(String name)
      Retrieves a product by its name.
      Specified by:
      getProductByName in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product
      Returns:
      the found ProductDto, or null if not implemented

    • deleteProductById

      public ProductDto deleteProductById(Long id) throws AccessDeniedException
      Deletes a product by its ID.

      Ensures that only the product owner can delete the product.

      Specified by:
      deleteProductById in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete
      Returns:
      the deleted ProductDto
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no product exists with the given ID
      AccessDeniedException - if the authenticated user is not the product owner

      Specified by:

      Returns:
